parameters.name: RootPoint
parameters.description: Array containing 3 doubles (x, y, z) for the start point of the line

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Array containing 3 doubles (x, y, z) for the end point of the line

title: IModeler.CreateLine
signature:
System.Object CreateLine( 
   System.Object
RootPoint
,
   System.Object
Direction
)

parameters.name: RootPoint
parameters.description: Array containing 3 doubles (x, y, z) for the start point of the line

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Array containing 3 doubles (x, y, z) for the end point of the line

remarks:
If your application uses
ISurface::CreateTrimmedSheet4
or
ISurface::ICreateTrimmedSheet4
, then your application must also use
ICurve::CreateTrimmedCurve2
for the curves created by
IModeler::CreateArc
or
IModeler::ICreateArc
and IModeler::CreateLine or
IModeler::ICreateLine
.
